COUNCIL:
What is your vision for the municipality of the above Council? (maximum 50 words)
I will be open minded, independent, and impartial considering all matters that come before
council to make Casey a better place to work and live in.

What expertise or attributes do you have which would help you in undertaking the role of Councillor?
Provide details (maximum 50 words)
"Team Player" - work constructively with others team members without dominating the flow of
information or ideas. "Relationship builders" - with internal and external customers and
vendors Cross-Culture Awareness - Volunteering within your community is a great way to
gain knowledge about, and respect for, other cultures and groups

Are you endorsed by a registered political party?
